abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deals played during the Bermuda Bowl World Team championship in Veldhoven, the Netherlands.
snippet: At the world bridge championships in Veldhoven, the Netherlands, the six American teams are locked in close battles.
lead_paragraph: At the world bridge championships in Veldhoven, the Netherlands, the six American teams are locked in close battles.

headline.seo: U.S. Teams in Close Battles at Bridge Championships
